Title: Cake Sushi
Description: ["Stop-motion commercials for Mizkan's cake sushi. The first episode features a jack-o-lantern ghoul tired of eating candy. The second episode features a depressed Santa Claus because he always has to eat Christmas cake."]
Related: ['Adaptation: Cinderella Girls Gekijou', 'Prequel: Cinderella Girls Gekijou: Climax Season']
